statements: UPDATE quality_control_inspections SET inspection_result = TRUE WHERE inspection_id = 1;

UPDATE products SET batch_number = 100, storage_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE product_id = 5;

UPDATE products SET expiry_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE product_id = 5;

UPDATE products SET category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2;

UPDATE inspections SET inspection_notes = 'Inspected and approved by QA team' WHERE inspection_id = 100;
UPDATE quality_control_inspections SET inspection_date = '2022-10-15', inspector_name = 'John Doe' WHERE inspection_id = 1;
